extendedInfo.description: The Cardiovascular Risk Calculator is an application which calculates the cardiovascular risk depending on given set of parameters. The calculated report will include the following1.CHD		Coronary heart disease. Calculated using Framingham equation.2.MI		Myocardial infarction. Calculated using Framingham equation.3.STROKE		Stroke. Calculated using Framingham equation.4.CVD		Cardiovascular disease. Calculated using Framingham equation.5.CHD_DEATH	Death from coronary heart disease. Calculated using Framingham equation.6.CVD_DEATH	Death from cardiovascular disease. Calculated using Framingham equation.7.BNF		BNF/JBS2 calculation of cardiovascular disease. Equals the sum of CHD and STROKE from Framingham equation.8.ASSIGN		Cardiovascular disease. Calculated using ASSIGN equation.Most calculators doesn't allow the user to input the time period of risk calculation. This application has more input parameters stated in the  Framingham equation. ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Framingham_Risk_Score )
